languages.text: "Как и то, что они умудрились заграбастать целый отсек, а офицеры "не заметили этого". Я устрою проверку".
"As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."
languages.original_text: "Как и то, что они умудрились заграбастать целый отсек, а офицеры "не заметили этого". Я устрою проверку".

traits.locale_text: "As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers just 'did not notice.' I will conduct an inspection."
"As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers just 'did not notice.' I will conduct an inspection."
"As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers just 'did not notice.' I shall conduct an inspection."
"As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers just 'did not notice.' I shall conduct an inspection."
"As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."
"As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."
"As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."

languages.text: "Genau wie die Tatsache, dass es ihnen gelungen ist, ein ganzes Modul einzunehmen, ohne dass den Offizieren etwas aufgefallen ist. Ich werde eine Inspektion durchführen."
languages.original_text: "As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."

traits.locale_text: "Genau wie die Tatsache, dass es ihnen gelungen ist, ein ganzes Modul einzunehmen, ohne dass den Offizieren etwas aufgefallen ist. Ich werde eine Inspektion durchführen."

languages.text: « Tout comme le fait qu'ils aient réussi à s'approprier un compartiment entier au nez et à la barbe des officiers. Je vais devoir procéder à une petite inspection. »
languages.original_text: "As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."

traits.locale_text: « Tout comme le fait qu'ils aient réussi à s'approprier un compartiment entier au nez et à la barbe des officiers. Je vais devoir procéder à une petite inspection. »

languages.text: «Como lo es el hecho de que se han adueñado de todo un compartimento sin que los oficiales lo sepan. Tendré que dirigir una inspección concienzuda».
languages.original_text: "As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."

traits.locale_text: «Como lo es el hecho de que se han adueñado de todo un compartimento sin que los oficiales lo sepan. Tendré que dirigir una inspección concienzuda».

languages.text: 「彼らが区画を丸ごと自分たちのものだと主張し、なぜか士官がそれに気づかなかったのは事実だ。これについて調査をするつもりだ」
languages.original_text: "As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らが区画を丸ごと自分たちのものだと主張し、なぜか士官がそれに気づかなかったのは事実だ。これについて調査をするつもりだ」

languages.text: “老实说，他们把整片舱室据为己有，但那些军官却好像完全没有注意到这件事情。我打算调查一下这到底是怎么回事。”
languages.original_text: "As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，他们把整片舱室据为己有，但那些军官却好像完全没有注意到这件事情。我打算调查一下这到底是怎么回事。”

languages.original_text: "As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."

languages.text: "Hakikat şu ki tüm kompartımanı kendilerine ayırmayı başarmışlar, subaylar bir şekilde bunu fark etmemiş. İnceleme başlatacağım."
languages.original_text: "As is the fact that they have managed to claim a whole compartment to themselves, and the officers somehow failed to notice. I shall conduct an inspection."
